WRITING.TEXT:
This is good. I wonder how the Twitch community will take this the way they did with Bob Ross - that stuff was fun.
Did they do this with Reading Rainbow yet? It would be pretty cool too if they did.

I remember when I started the show during that hiatus... And waiting ages for the In Too Deep story to air after I finished. Good thing I discovered other things thanks to it to keep me company through time.
I also vividly remember the time when those Super Watermelon Island and Barn Mates clips leaked. Good times!

Thanks, sir. That will definitely work for me.
And now you just game me an odd thirst for some green tea. Thanks for that, too.

WRITING.TITLE: I want to check this series out.... Am I doing it right, or is there an utterly agreed-upon order?
WRITING.TEXT:
So, this franchise/series sounds super special amazing and I'd like to start it out sometime, so I set me this order:
Fate 06 (I'm sorry, but I just have it here to get a basic idea of enjoyment), UBW, VN (if I can't wait long enough for Heaven's Feel), and finally Fate/Zero.
Does this seem good enough for a newbie fan like me, or is there a totally agreed on series order that has to be followed? I really appreciate all the stuff put into this series and its fans, so I hate to be a total idiot but let me know what there is to be done for first-timers. All of this can be very complicated, hearing different orders left and right.
(BTW: I know Fate 06 is supposed to suck, but I'm still going to watch it just to get a decent idea as to what I'm gonna be in for, and to look forward all the more to the better adaptations that improve upon the series' concept.)
